Hi, I'm Stu, web developer

Front End Developer

Who am I?

Trading in my work boots for a comfy chair, I made the career jump from the brewing industry to embark on a new journey into the world of technology.

With a strong desire to learn and an unwavering self-driven attitude, I'm currently teaching myself HTML, CSS, and vanilla JavaScript. I actively participate in several web developer groups within the vibrant tech community here in Portland, OR. By staying involved and engaged in these groups, I'm able to keep up-to-date with the latest industry trends, continuously improve my skills, and contribute to the growth of the local tech scene.

In my free time, I enjoy creating music, indulging in fine Belgian beer, and honing my skills at the local rock climbing gym.
